@greengecko29 irritates the hell out of me. Doesn't happen often. But it's blatant ay.
@ChaniTheunissen 6) Calendar everything. With two reminders - One two days beforehand, and one 2hours/30mins before
@ChaniTheunissen 5) Make a to-do list, and put up things that you've already completed so you can tick them/cross them out at the start
@ChaniTheunissen 1) don't think about it, just do it. 2) Touch something once. 3) No better time, than now. 4) Break it down into steps
FFS! I send in an assignment and they reply to me as "Hannah" WTF?! Can't people read the letters on their screen, on multiple counts??
Feeling flatter than a pancake.
